SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.vulkan

Class EXTRasterizationOrderAttachmentAccess

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.vulkan.EXTRasterizationOrderAttachmentAccess
public final class EXTRasterizationOrderAttachmentAccess extends Object
This extension extends the mechanism of input attachments to allow access to framebuffer attachments that are used both as input and as color or depth/stencil attachments from one fragment to the next, in rasterization order, without explicit synchronization.
Examples

None.

VK_EXT_rasterization_order_attachment_access
Name String
VK_EXT_rasterization_order_attachment_access
Extension Type
Device extension
Registered Extension Number
464
Revision
1
Extension and Version Dependencies
  • Requires support for Vulkan 1.0
  • Requires VK_KHR_get_physical_device_properties2 to be enabled for any device-level functionality
Contact
  • Jan-Harald Fredriksen janharaldfredriksen-arm
Extension Proposal
VK_EXT_rasterization_order_attachment_access
Other Extension Metadata
Last Modified Date
2022-07-04
IP Status
No known IP claims.
Contributors
  • Tobias Hector, AMD
  • Jan-Harald Fredriksen, Arm
